--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras:
> 
> "Unicron is here altought he's pretty quiet
> lately"said Hydras"I 
> cant remember clearlty what happened but it seems
> that he triggered 
> some kind of energy that set all in stasis but when
> I awake I was 
> alone inside a pred city that only thinks in help
> maximals to defeat 
> the menace as if we couldnt do it... or neither they
> use that excuse 
> to wont fight MAximals, since the awake I havent
> seen unicron. 
> Slowly I'm recovering my group...by now we're four
> and I have a bot 
> around that I dont trust a lot of him. and Rodimus
> prime is the 
> Matrix beared... the second Autobots leader "

     Myrmidon chuckles thoughtfully. "Perhaps, great
liege we could use this alliance of thiers. If this
Unicron is as great as you say, not one of us could
take it in single combat, and even four would make
little difference." 

     Myrmidon stopped and looked at Hydras, "but if
our enemies are already allying themselves together,
then it would behoove us to be in on that alliance."
Myrmidon's movements are strong and powerful as he
gestured with outstretched hands. "If Unicron is
defeated we would be able to take advantage of the
resultant chaos to forge our own victory for the
Predacons. If Unicron is Victorious, then we have the
honor of dying gloriously in battle."

     Myrmidon paused for a long moment studying
Hydras, and then continued his voice somehow softer
yet even more forceful, "Yet, if we are alone out
here, with only a small number of us, we are
vulnerable. Even a dragon can be taken down if there
are are sufficient arrows. No beast can stand alone
against the world. Once the great battle against
Unicron is over, we would face either the combined
forces of our enemies and we would be slain, or the
forces of Unicron and we still die." 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
